view.utilities

Class AudioManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.utilities.AudioManager

  • public final class AudioManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class, created using a singleton pattern, manages access to audio.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Actions> getAllowedActions()
      This method returns the list of actions supported by this manager.
      static AudioManager getAudioManager()
      Static method that returns the only permitted instance of this class.
      double getEffectsVolume()
      This method returns the audio clip's volume.
      double getMusicVolume()
      This method returns the volume of the theme currently playing.
      boolean isAudioAvailable()
      This method indicates if the manager is capable or not of reproducing audio on the requiring system.
      void playClip(Actions action)
      This method play an audio clip.
      void playTheme(Music theme)
      This method instantiates a media player to play game's main themes.
      void setEffectsVolume(double volume)
      This method sets the audio clip's volume.
      void setMusicVolume(double volume)
      This method sets the volume of the theme currently playing.

    • Method Detail

      • getAudioManager

        public static AudioManager getAudioManager()
        Static method that returns the only permitted instance of this class.
        Returns:
        An AudioManager instance

      • isAudioAvailable

        public boolean isAudioAvailable()
        This method indicates if the manager is capable or not of reproducing audio on the requiring system.
        Returns:
        True if AudioManager is running correctly, false otherwise

      • playClip

        public void playClip(Actions action)
        This method play an audio clip.
        Parameters:
        action - The action that shows which clip has to be played
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the required clip is not in the list of the allowed ones

      • playTheme

        public void playTheme(Music theme)
        This method instantiates a media player to play game's main themes. If the required theme is already playing it does nothing.
        Parameters:
        theme - The theme to be played

      • getMusicVolume

        public double getMusicVolume()
        This method returns the volume of the theme currently playing.
        Returns:
        The volume of the theme
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If no theme is playing

      • setMusicVolume

        public void setMusicVolume(double volume)
        This method sets the volume of the theme currently playing.
        Parameters:
        volume - The new volume of the theme
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If no theme is playing

      • getEffectsVolume

        public double getEffectsVolume()
        This method returns the audio clip's volume.
        Returns:
        Effects volume

      • setEffectsVolume

        public void setEffectsVolume(double volume)
        This method sets the audio clip's volume.
        Parameters:
        volume - New effects volume

      • getAllowedActions

        public java.util.List<Actions> getAllowedActions()
        This method returns the list of actions supported by this manager.
        Returns:
        A list of actions
